name: Legend of the ShieldBearers
description:
Fast-Paced VR Shield Wielding Action (Oculus only)

This game is all about defending yourself from an onslaught of many things: Meteors, ghosts, and computer viruses to name a few. Use unique shields like binary data, bones, and exorcist gear to defend yourself.

Play across insane worlds/levels filled with Dinosaurs, Apocalypses, and Catapults! Oh My!

This game is in prerelease and is constantly being improved and updated. Positive feedback is encouraged especially since this is my first game. If you purchase the game now you will have full access when the game is fully released(as well as published on steam) If you don't want to buy feel free to play the demo. It will have all the features until the full release. Just pay with comments and advice :)

ENJOY!
